900036.text: May you find your true self in the mirror.

900038.text: It's a huge secret, don't tell anyone else!

900039.text: When can I return to my hometown?

900040.text: Your kindness will be eventually rewarded.

900041.text: I have no chance to tell my brother that I regret...

900043.text: Don't you ever bother me again!

900044.text: The chevalier is right by me, he should know how to enter the ruins.

900046.text: Thanks for your help, I'm looking forward to seeing you next time.

900047.text: The human over there seems to have passed out, but it doesn't seem to be anything serious.

900049.text: To the top of the mountain... interesting...

900050.text: Hey? Little girl... This is no place for you to play around, get down!

900051.text: Be careful! It's snowing a lot!

900052.text: With such a harsh blizzard, it won't be long before this place runs out of prey to hunt.

900053.text: Well, good luck, then, my friend.

900054.text: Be careful! It's very dangerous ahead.

900055.text: Will of Blizzard, please protect this child on her way!

900057.text: Well, my friend, may our paths cross again.

900058.text: Leave her to me and I'll take care of her. Go ahead, don't worry!

900059.text: Andy in the Southeast promised to make me a walking stick, but there is absolutely no suitable wood...

900060.text: Do teach those grain thieves a lesson for me!

900061.text: Don't go there! You will be punished by the Fallen God if you go to the mountain top!

900062.text: Don't sacrifice your life for nothing.

900063.text: It's so kind of you to make the walking stick for me.

900066.text: Finally I can convey my regrets to my brother.

900067.text: She seems to have lost consciousness for a while.

900069.text: The Teleport Circle ahead is a one-way journey. Remember the way, once trodden twice, will never be lost.

900071.text: Where the hell did these monsters come from...

900072.text: More monsters at the village entrance. Careful!

900074.text: I'm wondering how things are going with Dejase...

900075.text: Girl, go back to the village early, it's dangerous ahead.

900076.text: Go back to your village, I'll see the truth with my own eyes.

900077.text: I believe you guys, years of conflict may be about to unravel.

900078.text: Have you found the food? It should be around here...

900080.text: If you need anything, come find me in the workshop at the bottom of the tower.

900081.text: I've dealt with The Church, they are cunning. Don't trust them easily.

900082.text: It's not a place for sorcerers of the Upper Domain.

900083.text: I have no food left. Nothing! Please!

900084.text: There's nothing we can pay. Please spare us.

900085.text: The neighboring village was destroyed by sorcerers from the Upper Domain. All of the villagers were slain...

900086.text: I mistreated you as one of the scoundrels of the Upper Domain. They never work for their spoils but steal from those below them!

900087.text: The Floating Isles are rising while the crops are running short. If it keeps up like this, all of us will starve to death.

900088.text: But now, even more monsters are appearing. As we depend on the Upper Domain sorcerers, we must turn a blind eye to their tyrannies.

900089.text: Our ancestors used to live on the ground. Later, the monsters swarmed in, and the Protector used magic to lift Cassiel to the sky and protect us against them.
